SELECT COUNT(*) as totcnt FROM COMTNDAMPRO A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID
AND D.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND B.KNWLDG_TY_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM , C.ORGNZT_ID , A.EXPERT_ID , D.USER_NM , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM , B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE , A.EXPERT_GRAD , A.EXPERT_DC , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EXPERT_CONFM_DE, 'YYYYmmdd'), 'YYYY-mm-dd') AS EXPERT_CONFM_DE , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNDAMPRO A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID AND A.EXPERT_ID = #{speId} AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #{knoTypeCd} AND A.EXPERT_GRAD = #{appTypeCd}
